short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to get notified of new invoices for approval and to upload new invoices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bauwise Construction financials management and cost tracking software helps construction project managers to stay in control of the construction budgets.

The extension enables you to log in to Bauwise, shows you all invoices assigned to you, and shows you push notifications when a new invoice is assigned to you.

Read more here: https://www.bauwise.com
